title: Former ISIS Brides Make Their Case to Return Home | John Legend
itunes:title: Former ISIS Brides Make Their Case to Return Home | John Legend
description:
President Trump meets with Kim Jong-un in Vietnam, two women who fled their countries to join ISIS fight to return, and EGOT winner John Legend stops by. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
